description:
The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.

The Google Customer Solutions (GCS) Product and Sales Activation (PSA) team is responsible for performance and brand solutions for small and medium business (SMB) advertisers, everyone from large mid market companies to local shops. We are the product and business experts behind the thousands of GCS Googlers that are responsible for driving sustainable growth and product adoption. We identify opportunities through analysis, build consensus with stakeholders, and program manage cross-functional teams to drive GCS advertiser success and growth. In this role, you’ll be responsible for product adoption metrics. You'll be an expert in Shopping and retail and how GCS customers engage with our products. You’ll analyze data to uncover opportunities to accelerate growth, building models to determine addressable audience, and growth impact and opportunities.

As a Global Product Lead, you will lead GCS retail customers and Shopping opportunities, engaging with the various Product, Marketing, and GCS teams (e.g., Acquisitions, Channel Sales, GCS Sales) to drive product changes and create go-to-market strategies and effective incentive systems to help drive Global GCS Shopping growth. You’ll gain valuable global experience, leading a virtual team of local product experts in other regions to manage programs, share discoveries and uncover new insights that help SMBs succeed around the world. The Performance team is responsible for growing the largest segment of Google’s ad business, and we value versatility, insightful thinking, and passion for both product and customers.

When our millions of advertisers and publishers are happy, so are we! Our Google Customer Solutions (GCS) team of entrepreneurial, enthusiastic and client-focused members are the "human face" of Google, helping entrepreneurs both individually and broadly build their online presence and grow their businesses. We are dedicated to growing the unique needs of advertising companies. Our teams of strategists, analysts, advisers and support specialists collaborate closely to spot and analyze customer needs and trends. In collaboration, we create and implement business plans broadly for all types of businesses.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of experience in sales, marketing, strategic consulting, or similar role (e.g., sales operations, sales finance, program management, etc.).

Preferred qualifications:

  • MBA, Master's degree, or PhD.
  • Understanding of the Google Ads product and how to create and optimize campaigns.
  • Ability to lead complex operational and strategic initiatives; Distinctive problem solving and analytical skills, combined with impeccable business judgment.
  • Ability to comfortably present solutions to diverse audiences and communicate with highly technical management and product teams.
  • Ability to work, collaborate, and influence cross-functionally.
  • Excellent problem-solving, strategic, and analytical skills combined with impeccable business judgment. Excellent communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Become a subject matter expert on Shopping and retail and how our customers use Shopping ads.
  • Define GCS product and go-to-market strategy for Shopping/Retail.
  • Identify key product needs across GCS and partner with Product and Engineering teams to execute action plans. Partner with in-region teams to ensure readiness to support new products/features.
  • Develop and refine best practices and collateral for planning, pitching, and measuring Shopping campaigns.
  • Work with Product, Marketing, Operations, and other cross-functional partners to identify and size market and customer opportunities, plan and manage programs to execute against those opportunities, and partner with Sales leadership on achieving those strategies globally and in-region.
title: Global Product Lead, Shopping, Google Customer Solutions
